name: Buz Puzzle Limited
description:
Features:

-Can use game images.

-Can use your private images*.

--Contains 4 collections of images,30 images per collection.

--Can add 2 collections of your private images.

-Can cut an image to jigsaw or squares shapes.

-Can cut an image to Extra large , large, medium or small pieces.

-Three different play modes to play depending on cut shape (jigsaw or squares)

--Drag, this is default and normal way to play, available for all cut shape.

--Slide, you slide a piece from place to another, available for square cut shape.

--Swap, you can swap a piece with another, available for squares cut shape.

-Can flipp pieces.

-Can rotate pieces randomly.

-Can show transparent image in background.

-Can see clear an image for few seconds in background.

You can set up the game in any difficulty level you want.

-Travel through the world and you meet friends and buy vehicles, and maybe you will meet your soulmate*

* Available in paid version
